translation: Whatever forms are produced, O Arjuna, in any womb whatsoever, the great Brahma is their womb, and I am the seed-giving father.
commentary: 14.4 in all the wombs? Kaunteya O son of Kunti (Arjuna)? Idols forms? are possible are produced? Yah which? Their their? Brahma Brahma? Great great? Vagina: womb? I'm I? seedgiving seedgiving? Father father.Commentary I am the father The Primordial Nature is the mother. The whole manifested world is the child Nature has produced in its association with me. Therefore I am called the father of this world.Wombs Such as the gods? the manes? men? cattle? beasts? birds? etc.Forms Bodies consisting of parts? limbs? organs? etc.
